title: Gini index of Taiwan 2008 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Gini's concentration coefficient. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
In general Gini's concentration coefficient has stayed the same over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2011 and 2012.
The highest Gini's concentration coefficient, of value 34.5 was reached at Year 2009
Minimum Gini's concentration coefficient about 33.6 was reached at Year 2013,  2014, and 2016
min_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Gini's concentration coefficient, containing a total of 11 data points.
